isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 10 SPEED AND 15 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RT, RTO, AND RTX SERIES - INSTALL - SHIFTER HOUSING

step1.para: Place all three mainshaft sliding clutches in the neutral position ( Figure 290). Position the shifter housing gasket.

figure.caption: Figure 290. Place Mainshaft Sliding Clutches in Neutral Position

step1.para: With all three shift yokes in the neutral position, install the shifter housing assembly on the case, fitting the shift yokes into the slots of the corresponding sliding clutches ( Figure 291).

figure.caption: Figure 291. Install Shifter Housing Assembly on Case

note.para: Avoid tilting the assembly during installation as the three sets of tension springs and balls are free to be released from the bores in the housing.

step1.para: Apply Loctite 242 to the bolt threads. Install the bolts in the housing and tighten to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 N·m) ( Figure 292).

figure.caption: Figure 292. Install Bolts in Housing and Tighten
